author: joes
msg: In prior change: s/cookie/cookies/ for Apache::Cookie::Jar, I forgot to sync the cookie test in inherit.pm (a big commit is coming soonish, so my local tree is significantly out of whack now). Thanks to Markus Wichitill for the spot.

author: joes
msg: Rename $jar->cookie $jar->cookies to match apreq_jar_t. Also allow $table->set and $table->add to accept a sole $value argument whenever $value is an Apache::Cookie or Apache::Upload object.
